item.title: Toronto Festival Adds Charli xcx, Ethan Hawke, Steve Coogan, Shailene Woodley Films
item.description: World debuts for movies by Gail Maurice, Cal McMau and Hubert Davis have also been added in the Centerpiece TIFF sidebar for global titles.

item.title: ‘Happy Gilmore 2’ Review: Adam Sandler’s Netflix Sequel Is Terrible — and Fans Will Love It
item.description: The golfer with anger management issues returns in this belated, cameo-laden follow-up to the cult comedy.
